Class CannonBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • CannonBall

  • public class CannonBall
extends java.lang.Object
    The CannonBall is used for shooting at Targets at the end of each level. To shoot, the user clicks their Left-Mouse button.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.jme3.scene.Spatial cBall
      Spatial representing the ball
      private com.jme3.bullet.control.RigidBodyControl cBallRB
      The RigidBodyControl for the ball (for collisions)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CannonBall(com.jme3.asset.AssetManager a)
      Constructs a CannonBall object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.jme3.bullet.control.RigidBodyControl getRB()
      Returns the RigidBodyControl that is used for detecting bounding boxes/collisions in the world.
      com.jme3.scene.Spatial getSpatial()
      Returns the Spatial that serves as the physical representation of the CannonBall in the world.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CannonBall

        public CannonBall(com.jme3.asset.AssetManager a)
        Constructs a CannonBall object. Initializes the Spatial for the CannonBall, as well as the Spatial's RigidBodyControl.
        Parameters:
        a - reference to the World's assetManager
        See Also:
        CannonGun
